ygData.subject: Re: Chains is definitely having problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just to mention that the mob does not need to have SoW for the chain not to work. This is how i find out. I was waiting for a friend, in Upper Guk, at the
ygData.messageBody:
Alex Firmani wrote:

> From: Alex Firmani <alexf@...>
>
> I've confirmed with three other bards over level 30 that there is a problem
> with Chains not giving any messages when used on creatures that have
> previous effects cast on them. As was mentioned yesterday, any mob with SOW
> on it can no longer be chained and will tear off to find help. This nearly
> killed me last night in Solusek's Eye. I was healing at the clockworks
> waiting for my partner when a young goblin strolled through for some reason
> and attacked.

Just to mention that the mob does not need to have SoW for the chain not to
work. This is how i find out.

I was waiting for a friend, in Upper Guk, at the entrance. I Was bored, so I
attack the Froglock Guard that are there... Well my chain was not working (No
message what so ever), and there was no "Shaman", and The Guard had no SoW on
him.

I did kill it, and was happy to know that bug before i get killed in Lower Guk
for relying on my chain.

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...

Hey diddle diddle,
The cat and the Fiddle.
The cow blew up
On the Launching Pad.
